author: Sarah Walpert
title: XINNIX, The Mortgage Academy Expands to Serve Rapid Customer Growth
text:
XINNIX , the premier sales and leadership training organization in the mortgage industry, expanded into new headquarters on August 31, 2015. XINNIX’s new headquarters, described as "Google-esque" by a visiting executive, is indicative of significant demand for their sales, leadership and strategic growth solutions. Inspired by some of the best Silicon Valley technology giants, XINNIX designed a contemporary environment where employees have use of collaboration, education and video production rooms. The headquarters is also situated along Big Creek Greenway, a 6.1 mile walk/bike/run recreation area. The state-of-the-art facility was designed with the goal of enabling associates to be more creative, innovative and ultimately, to help their customers become more profitable.
"We've engineered a beautiful, collaborative work environment that reflects our team's passion for fueling the mortgage industry with productivity, new sales talent and inspired leaders,” said Casey Cunningham, CEO and Founder of XINNIX.
In 2015, XINNIX added key executives to their leadership team to spearhead their strategic growth, better serve their customers and help mortgage executives navigate massive industry shifts.
XINNIX was founded in 2002 by Casey Cunningham , a 30+-year mortgage industry veteran. HousingWire Magazine recently recognized Cunningham as one to the 40 Most Influential Woman Executives in the mortgage banking industry. Her passion for training and development, as well as her unique skills in helping others discover their true potential was the inspiration for XINNIX, The Mortgage Academy.
The new XINNIX headquarters is located at:
3820 Mansell Road, Suite 280
Alpharetta, GA 30022
About XINNIX
XINNIX, founded in 2002 and headquartered in Atlanta, provides mortgage loan officers and sales managers with proven, comprehensive training programs designed to enhance sales productivity, manager effectiveness and company profitability. The XINNIX team trains mortgage professionals in retail origination, executive leadership, business development, wholesale origination, and mortgage operations. Learn more about XINNIX by calling (678) 325-3500 or visiting the company’s website at http://www.XINNIX.com .
